
The 1980s Dumping Ground

# BITSY VERSION 4.6

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

NAME Winning beacon

ITM 7
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00100000
NAME Intro
DLG ITM_2

DLG SPR_0
The rumours are true. There really are a gazillion copies of Atari's ET game buried in this dump.

DLG SPR_1
Oh no! You've awoken the slumbering alien monsters. We are all doomed... & it's ALL YOUR FAULT!

DLG SPR_2
A clay pipe. Never found one of them before!

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - The rotting fabric of fashion that should stay buried...
  - ...legwarmers...
  - ...neon spandex...
  - ...shoulder pads...
  - You have found such 1980s glory deep in the landfill, but this isn't the ultimate treasure... keep searching for it.
}
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{sequence
  - The long lost forgotten technology of the ancients...
  - ...Betamax video...
  - ...Oric Atmos...
  - You have found such 1980s glory deep in the landfill, but this isn't the ultimate treasure... keep searching for it.
}
"""

DLG ITM_2
Dating back to the 1980s, the dump is filled with such treasures. You can sense their retro vibes calling you. Dig for those treasures.

END 0
You have discovered the ultimate 1980s buried treasure. The rumours are true! This dump is full of thousands of buried Atari ET cartridges! Oh my!

END 1
Millenia ago the Aliens were buried deep in the ground and now you have awoken them. Under the dump no-one can hear you scream!

END 2
You have discovered the ultimate 1980s buried treasure. The rumours are true! This dump is full of thousands of buried Atari ET cartridges! Oh my!

VAR a
42
